entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Easier way configure conversion for all properties of readonly struct type #25896
    6.0.0
  • Indentation is wrong when scaffolding DbContext without a namespace #25403
    6.0.0
  • Converting bool to DateTime throws InvalidCastException #25475
  • Please help to debug the dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold command #25888
  • Internal function parameter type added as entity type on model creation when model contains many-to-many relation #25879
  • Migrations do not work when an owned type property is called Item #25501
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Backing fields that participate in seeding not work properly, when we use them for transforming (change/reformat) the data that coming from or going to the database #25459
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Setting foreign key to null by PropertyEntry.CurrentValue deletes entity #25360
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Aggregate on optional dependent lacks condition #23230
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Transaction deadlocks within a simple DB model #14371
    6.0.0-rc2

Updated

  • Verify exceptions when Include() is used in invalid or not supported locations in a query #14671
    Backlog
  • Query: inconsistent behavior between relational and InMemory/L2O for queries grouping by a constant #19683
  • SqlServer: Split query involving Skip without OrderBy does not work #21202
  • Query/InMemory: compilation error for complex query with correlated collection and distinct #24291
    6.0.0
  • Query: parameter nullability sniffing broken for global query filters #24645
  • Incorrect insert SQL when composite key contains identity and default value properties #23941
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database provider with Boolean discriminator TPH fails #24657
    6.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException when projection is used with OData #24092
    6.0.0
  • Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #25315
    6.0.0
  • Simple uses of MathF fail on SQL Server #25421
    6.0.0
  • Test Comparison_with_value_converted_subclass fails on InMemory #25615
    6.0.0
  • SharedTypeQueryRelationalTestBase does not delimit identifiers in raw SQL #25661
    6.0.0
  • Query/InMemory: projecting (int?)(myBaseEntity as MyDerivedEntity).IntOnDerived defaults to 0 rather than null #25735
    6.0.0
  • Precompiling models and missing usings #25812
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database throwing NullReferenceException when using a nullable value-converted property in a query #25492
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Issues when loading derived type via base set and vice versa #25886
  • Comparison with TimeSpanToStringConverter doesn't work correctly for 1 day+ TimeSpans #25920
  • Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1[System.Boolean]' cannot be used for return type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[System.Object]' #25958
  • Always encrypted numeric column is considered as decimal #25932
  • InMemory provider deletes wrong entry when DELETE and ADD for same PK #25905
  • dotnet-ef requires x64 SDK on macOS Monterey with Apple Silicon (M1) #25927
  • [Bug] The specified deps.json does not exist -- MAUI + Blazor stack with EntityFrameworkCore Migrations #25938
  • Consider not including a blank line between query tags #25414
    6.0.0
  • Flexible mapping to CLR types and members (Custom O/C Mapping) #240
    Epics
  • Improve many-to-many, skip navigations, and indexer properties #22960
    Epics

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Enable test for #24291 #25974
  • Add a way for providers to filter out non-identity conditions. #25973
  • Query: Add regression test for #24657 #25972
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25971
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Convert result of Round appropriately for MathF functions #25970
  • InMemory: Read nullable value for derived properties #25968
  • Handle nulls passed to typed equality method expression #25966
  • Generate multiple query tags without newlines between them #25963
  • More links to conceptual docs #25962

Merged

  • Apply pre-convention value converters on nullable types #25969
  • Make compiled model classes public and supporting classes internal #25967
  • Fix indentation when scaffolding with no namespace #25964
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25956
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Delete optional orphans when foreign key value is set to null #25957
  • More links to conceptual docs #25937
  • Make sure navigations on property bag entity types don't use CLR properties. #25960
  • Always sort deletes before inserts for the same table to avoid deadlocks. #25952
  • Query: Add condition when accessing property on optional dependent wh… #25949

Updated

  • Migrations: Honor [Column(Order)] in CreateTable operation #25942
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #19883 - Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #25951
